title: Welcome to Stellar Miner
body: Click the asteroid (or press Space) to mine coins. Your goal: grow your mining operation by buying upgrades, hiring crew, and expanding to new planets. Your first planet has 6 slots: you can place at most 6 upgrades (robots, drills, etc.) until you add more slots or discover new planets. Mine until you can afford your first upgrade (25 ⬡).

title: Upgrades
body: Spend coins to buy equipment that produces coins automatically. Each upgrade adds production per second. You have a limited number of slots per planet (6 on your first planet): each robot or drill uses one slot, so you can place at most 6 upgrades there until you add slots or discover new planets. Start with a Mining Robot (25 ⬡), then scale up to thousands, millions, and beyond.

title: Crew
body: Hire astronauts to boost your production (+2% per astronaut). Better upgrades require crew to operate—you spend astronauts when you buy those upgrades. Hire your first astronaut at 1,000 ⬡.

title: Scientific Research
body: Skill tree: attempt to unlock nodes for +% production and +% click. Each attempt can succeed or fail (coins lost on failure). Resets on Prestige.

title: Planets
body: Send astronauts on expeditions to discover new planets (+5% production each). Some may die during the mission; if all die, the planet is not discovered. First expedition: 50,000 ⬡. You can also add slots to existing planets.

title: Random events
body: Space is full of surprises. Random events will now occasionally boost or reduce your production for a short time. Watch the event badges and plan around them!

title: Quests
body: Complete quests for bonus coins and rewards. Each quest has a target (e.g. mine X coins, buy upgrades). Claim within 5 minutes of completion for a streak bonus. Check the Quest section above.

title: Prestige
body: When you reach 1,000,000 coins you can Prestige: reset coins and planets to gain +5% production per prestige level forever. Use it to progress faster on each new run and climb the K → M → B curve.
